TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NumericPagerField extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataPagerField

summary.span: 表示可讓使用者依據頁碼選取頁面的 欄位。

span.span: Represents a field that enables users to select a page by page number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會顯示在瀏覽控制項控制項。The class displays navigation controls in a control. 可用的控制項實作的控制項所顯示的資料進行分頁介面，例如控制項。The controls can be used to page through data that is displayed by a control that implements the interface, such as the control. 物件顯示為按鈕，使用者可以按一下以移至特定頁面的頁碼。The object displays page numbers as buttons that users can click to move to specific a page. 控制項也會顯示下一頁和上一頁按鈕，可讓使用者存取資料的控制項所顯示的還要更多的頁面。The control also displays next-page and previous-page buttons that enable users to access more pages of data than the ones that are displayed by the control. 您可以自訂的外觀使用下表中所列屬性的物件。You can customize the appearance of the object by using the properties that are listed in the following table. |屬性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||目前的頁碼的 CSS 類別。The CSS class for the current page number.| ||下一頁和上一頁按鈕的 CSS 類別。The CSS class for the next-page and previous-page buttons.| ||表示頁碼按鈕的 CSS 類別。The CSS class for the buttons that represent the page numbers.| 您可以使用屬性，以選取將會顯示的按鈕類型。You can use the property to select the type of button that will be displayed. 下表列出可用的按鈕類型。The following table lists the available button types. |按鈕類型Button type|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| || 控制項。A control.| || 控制項。An control.| || 控制項。A control.| 內的控制項兩者之間的不分行空格，以呈現物件。The controls inside the object are rendered with non-breaking spaces between them. 如果您想要自訂此行為，您可以使用屬性。If you want to customize this behavior, you can use the property. 您可以隱藏物件藉由設定控制屬性設`false`。You can hide a object in a control by setting the property to `false`. 您無法控制的下一頁和上一頁按鈕的可見性。You cannot control the visibility of the next-page and previous-page buttons. 如果相關聯的資料控制項具有可供顯示的其他頁面，它們會顯示控制項。They are displayed by the control if the associated data control has additional pages available to display. 您可以使用屬性來指定幾個按鈕會顯示在物件。You can use the property to specify how many buttons are displayed in a object. 每個按鈕對應到頁碼。Each button corresponds to a page number. 您可以藉由設定設定為下一頁按鈕的文字屬性。You can set the text of the next-page button by setting the property. 您可以透過設定 [上一頁] 按鈕的文字屬性。You can set the text of the previous-page button by using the property. 當屬性設定為，您必須提供下一頁和上一頁按鈕將會顯示影像的 URL。When the property is set to , you must provide the URL of an image that will be displayed for the next-page and previous page buttons. 您可以設定和屬性。You do this by setting the and properties. 在此情況下，對應的文字屬性作為映像的替代文字。In that case, the corresponding text property is used as the alternate text for the image. 比方說，由所指定的文字屬性會顯示為下一步 頁面的影像按鈕的替代文字。For example, the text that is specified by the property is displayed as the alternate text for the next-page image button. 在瀏覽器支援工具提示，這段文字也會顯示為對應的按鈕的工具提示。On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip for the corresponding button. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用物件中顯示的資料進行分頁控制項。The following example shows how to use a object to page through data that is displayed in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField/CS/NumericPagerFieldCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField/VB/NumericPagerFieldVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式通常是當您將欄位加入至動態建立控制項。This constructor is typically used when you add fields to a dynamically created control. 若要新增以動態方式為物件控制項，建立新物件，設定其屬性，並將其加入的欄位集合控制項。To add a object dynamically to a control, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the field collection for the control. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用以動態方式加入的建構函式物件至控制項。The following example shows how to use the constructor to dynamically add a object to a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.Ctor/CS/NumericPagerFieldCtorCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.Ctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerField.Ctor/VB/NumericPagerFieldCtorVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定要在 物件中顯示的按鈕數目。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of buttons to display in a object.

value.span: 要在 物件中顯示的按鈕數目。

span.span: The number of buttons to display in a object.

value.span: 預設值為 5。

span.span: The default is 5.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定要顯示的按鈕數目物件。Use the property to specify the number of buttons to display in a object. 每個按鈕對應到頁碼。Each button corresponds to a page number. 如果物件具有更多的頁面，針對指定的數字比，控制項會顯示讓使用者存取下的一組頁面的下一頁按鈕。If the object has more pages than the number specified for , the control displays a next-page button that lets users access the next set of pages. 物件會顯示現有的頁面數字的按鈕。The object displays buttons only for existing page numbers. 如果物件具有較少的頁面，以顯示所指定的數目，控制項會顯示較少的按鈕，這個屬性所指定的數目。If the object has fewer pages to show than the number specified for , the control shows fewer buttons than the number specified by this property. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來變更預設會顯示在的頁面按鈕數目物件的控制項。The following example shows how to use the property to change the default number of page buttons that are displayed in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/CS/NumericPagerCssCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/VB/NumericPagerCssVB.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 屬性會設定為小於 1 的值。

span.span: The property is set to a value less than 1.

span.span: Gets or sets the button type to display in the pager field.

value.span: 其中一個 值。

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出可用的按鈕類型。The following table lists the available button types. |按鈕類型值Button type value|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| || 控制項。A control.| || 控制項。An control.| || 控制項。A control.| 當屬性設定為，您必須提供下一頁和上一頁按鈕之影像的 URL。When the property is set to , you must provide the URL of an image for the next-page and previous page buttons. 若要這樣做，您可以使用和屬性。To do this, you can use the and properties. 對應的文字屬性用於映像做為替代文字。The corresponding text property is used as the alternate text for the image. 比方說，由所指定的文字屬性會顯示為下一步 頁面的影像按鈕的替代文字。For example, the text that is specified by the property is displayed as the alternate text for the next-page image button. 在瀏覽器支援工具提示，這段文字也會顯示為對應的按鈕的工具提示。On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip for the corresponding button. 值屬性儲存在檢視狀態。The value of the property is stored in view state. 如果屬性不是空字串或`null`，則物件會忽略值屬性。If the property is not an empty string or `null`, the object ignores the value of the property. 在此情況下，控制項用來建立按鈕。In that case, the control is used to create the buttons. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來指定映像按鈕會顯示在物件的控制項。The following example shows how to use the property to specify that image buttons are displayed in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl/CS/NumericPagerUrlCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl/VB/NumericPagerUrlVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法。The method is a helper method. 它由方法來複製目前的內容物件傳入的物件`newField`參數。It is used by the method to copy the properties of the current object to the object that is passed in the `newField` parameter.

span.para: 覆寫方法，將複製的衍生類別中所建立的新屬性。呼叫基底類別的方法，讓屬性類別也會一併複製。
Override the method to copy the new properties that were created in the derived class. Call the base class's method so that the properties of the class are also copied.

summary.span: 取得或設定用來設定目前頁碼樣式的階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別。

span.span: Gets or sets the cascading style sheet (CSS) class that is used to style the current page number.

value.span: 用來設定瀏覽器中之目前頁碼樣式的 CSS 類別。

span.span: The CSS class that is used to style the current page number in the browser.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定 屬性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定用來樣式的 CSS 類別物件，表示目前選取的頁面數目。Use the property to specify the CSS class that is used to style the object that represents the number of the page that is currently selected. 屬性一律會轉譯為`class`屬性，不論瀏覽器。The property is always rendered as a `class` attribute, regardless of the browser. > [!NOTE] > 不支援設定的 CSS 的瀏覽器上屬性沒有任何作用。On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the property has no effect. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指定要在目前頁碼樣式的 CSS 類別物件的控制項。The following example shows how to specify a CSS class to style the current page number in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/CS/NumericPagerCssCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/VB/NumericPagerCssVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void HandleEvent(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.CommandEventArgs e) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub HandleEvent (e As CommandEventArgs)

span.span: The event data.

summary.span: 處理 物件中發生的事件並執行適當的動作。

span.span: Handles events that occur in the object and performs the appropriate action.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是 helper 方法。The method is a helper method. 它由方法以處理中發生的事件物件，其中一個按鈕控制項內按一下時。It is used by the method to handle events that occur in the object when one of the buttons inside the control is clicked. 方法會檢查屬性中所包含的物件`e`參數，然後執行適當的動作。The method examines the property of the object that is contained in the `e` parameter, and then performs the appropriate action. 下表列出所提供的按鈕物件並按一下按鈕時執行的動作。The following table lists the buttons provided by the object and the action that is performed when the button is clicked. |按鈕Button|CommandName 值CommandName value|動作Action| |------------|-----------------------|------------| |numberNumber|頁碼Page number|瀏覽至對應的資料頁。Navigates to the corresponding page of data.| |前一頁Previous page||顯示先前的頁面數字集，並瀏覽的最後一個頁面，該集合中的資料。Displays the previous set of page numbers and navigates to the last page of data in that set.| |下一個頁面Next page||顯示先前的頁面數字集，並瀏覽至該集合中的資料的第一頁。Displays the previous set of page numbers and navigates to the first page of data in that set.|

summary.span: 取得或設定針對 物件中的下一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of an image that is displayed for the next-page button in the object.

value.span: 針對 物件中的下一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。

span.span: The URL of an image that is displayed for the next-page button in the object.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定 屬性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為，使用屬性來指定要為下一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。When the property is set to , use the property to specify the URL of an image that is displayed for the next-page button. 影像可以是任何支援的瀏覽器，例如.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 和.png 的檔案格式。The image can be in any file format that is supported in browser, such as .jpg, .gif, .bmp, and .png. 當以外的其他屬性設定為值，將屬性沒有任何作用。When the property is set to a value other than , setting the property has no effect. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何顯示映像中的 [下一頁] 按鈕物件的控制項。The following example shows how to display an image for the next-page button in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl/CS/NumericPagerUrlCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl/VB/NumericPagerUrlVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為中, 指定的文字屬性映像時，可做為替代文字。When the property is set to , the text specified in the property is used as the alternate text for the image. 在瀏覽器支援工具提示，這段文字也會顯示為對應的按鈕的工具提示。On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip for the corresponding button. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 它可以是自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。It can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何自訂中的頁面巡覽區欄位的 [下一頁] 按鈕的顯示文字控制項。The following example shows how to customize the text that is displayed for the next-page button of the pager field in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText/CS/NumericPagerTextCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText/VB/NumericPagerTextVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別，這個類別用來設定頁面巡覽區欄位之下一頁和上一頁按鈕的樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the cascading style sheet (CSS) class that is used to style the next-page and previous-page buttons of the pager field.

value.span: CSS 類別，用來設定頁面巡覽區欄位之下一頁和上一頁按鈕的樣式。

span.span: The CSS class that is used to style the next-page and previous-page buttons of the pager field.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定 屬性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下一頁和上一頁按鈕會顯示類別，讓使用者存取資料的其他頁面的頁面總數大於指定的值時屬性。The next-page and previous-page buttons are displayed by the class to let users access other pages of data when the total number of pages is greater than the value specified in the property. 屬性一律會轉譯為`class`屬性，不論瀏覽器。The property is always rendered as a `class` attribute, regardless of the browser. > [!NOTE] > 不支援設定的 CSS 的瀏覽器上屬性沒有任何作用。On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the property has no effect. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指定 CSS 類別來設定樣式中的下一頁和上一頁按鈕物件的控制項。The following example shows how to specify a CSS class to style the next-page and previous-page buttons in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/CS/NumericPagerCssCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/VB/NumericPagerCssVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ NumericButtonCssClass { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.NumericButtonCssClass : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別，這個類別用來設定頁面巡覽區欄位之頁碼按鈕的樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the cascading style sheet (CSS) class that is used to style the page-number buttons of the pager field.

value.span: CSS 類別，用來設定頁面巡覽區欄位之頁碼按鈕的樣式。

span.span: The CSS class that is used to style the page-number buttons of the pager field.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定 屬性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所顯示之頁碼按鈕類別，以讓使用者能夠直接瀏覽至個別頁面。Page-number buttons are displayed by the class to enable users to navigate directly to individual pages. 指定的 CSS 類別屬性會套用到所有顯示的頁碼物件，除了目前選取的頁面。The CSS class specified by the property is applied to all page numbers that are displayed by the object, except for the page that is currently selected. 目前所選的頁面會使用所指定的 CSS 類別屬性。The page currently selected page uses the CSS class that is specified by the property. 屬性一律會轉譯為`class`屬性，不論瀏覽器。The property is always rendered as a `class` attribute, regardless of the browser. > [!NOTE] > 不支援設定的 CSS 的瀏覽器上屬性沒有任何作用。On browsers that do not support CSS, setting the property has no effect. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何指定 CSS 類別來設定樣式中的數字按鈕物件的控制項。The following example shows how to specify a CSS class to style the page number buttons in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/CS/NumericPagerCssCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldCss/VB/NumericPagerCssVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PreviousPageImageUrl { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.PreviousPageImageUrl : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定針對 物件中上一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。

span.span: Gets or sets the URL of an image that is displayed for the previous-page button in the object.

value.span: 為 物件中上一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。

span.span: The URL to an image that is displayed for the previous-page button in the object.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示未設定 屬性。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為，使用屬性可指定為前一頁按鈕顯示之影像的 URL。When the property is set to , use the property to specify the URL of an image that is displayed for the previous-page button. 影像可以是任何瀏覽器，例如.jpg、.gif、.bmp、 和.png 支援的檔案格式。The image can be in any file format that is supported in browsers, such as .jpg, .gif, .bmp, and .png. 當以外的其他屬性設定為值，將屬性沒有任何作用。When the property is set to a value other than , setting the property has no effect. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何顯示映像中的 [上一頁] 按鈕物件的控制項。The following example shows how to display an image for the previous-page button in the object of a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl/CS/NumericPagerUrlCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldUrl/VB/NumericPagerUrlVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ PreviousPageText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.PreviousPageText : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定為上一頁按鈕顯示的文字。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that is displayed for the previous-page button.

value.span: 為上一頁按鈕顯示的文字。

span.span: The text that is displayed for the previous-page button.

value.span: 預設為 "…"。

span.span: The default is "…".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為中的文字屬性映像時，可做為替代文字。When the property is set to , the text in the property is used as the alternate text for the image. 在瀏覽器支援工具提示，這段文字也會顯示為對應的按鈕的工具提示。On browsers that support tooltips, this text is also displayed as a tooltip for the corresponding button. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 它可以是自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。It can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何自訂中的頁面巡覽區欄位的 [上一頁] 按鈕的顯示文字控制項。The following example shows how to customize the text that is displayed for the previous-page button of the pager field in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText/CS/NumericPagerTextCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NumericPagerFieldText/VB/NumericPagerTextVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RenderNonBreakingSpacesBetweenControls { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否要在控制項之間呈現不分行空格。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether non-breaking spaces will be rendered between controls.

value.span: 如果要在控制項之間呈現不分行空格則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if non-breaking spaces will be rendered between controls; otherwise, .

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定是否不分行空格 (HTML` `字元參考) 的控制項之間呈現物件，例如頁面按鈕。Use the property to specify whether non-breaking spaces (the HTML ` ` character reference) will be rendered between the controls of the object, such as the page buttons. 如果您需要更充分掌控您要建立具有階層式樣式表 (CSS) 類別的配置，您可以設定至`false`。If you need more control over the layout that you are creating with cascading style sheet (CSS) classes, you can set to `false`.
